plot: Army Lieutenant Tufts accompanies scout Quincy Wyatt into the Everglades to rout the Seminole Indians who are threatening the early settlers in Florida. When the command is forced to run, Wyatt and Seminole Chief Oscala square off in an exciting climax.   Written by  Buxx Banner
title: Tambores Lejanos
plot_es: Army Lieutenant Tufts accompanies scout Quincy Wyatt into the Everglades to rout the Seminole Indians who are threatening the early settlers in Florida. When the command is forced to run, Wyatt and Seminole Chief Oscala square off in an exciting climax.   Written by  Buxx Banner

cast.role: Judy Beckett - a prisoner of the Seminoles
cast.name: Mari Aldon
